title: Spicy Lentil Curry
shortDescription: Enjoy the flavors of India with this spicy and comforting lentil curry. Perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal.
fullDescription: Enjoy the flavors of India with this spicy and comforting lentil curry. Made with a blend of aromatic spices and nutritious lentils, it's perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal. Serve it with steamed rice or naan bread.

instructionGroups.label: For the lentil curry
instructions: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion and cook until softened.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, and cook for another minute.
Add chopped tomatoes, curry powder, ground cumin, ground turmeric, and cayenne pepper. Cook for a few minutes until the tomatoes start to break down.
Add red lentils, vegetable broth, and coconut milk. Stir well.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the lentils are tender.

instructionGroups.label: For serving
instructions: Serve the lentil curry over steamed rice.
Serve with naan bread on the side.

tips: Feel free to adjust the spiciness of the curry by adding more or less cayenne pepper.
You can add vegetables like spinach or bell peppers for extra nutrition.
Leftover curry can be refrigerated and enjoyed the next day. The flavors will meld together even more!
